verses.verse: [This is] the <S%H1697>message<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H1263>Baruch<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5374>Neriah,<s%> when he had <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H3789>down<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> in a <S%H5612>book<s%> at Jeremiah's <S%H6310>dictation,<s%> in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> saying: <S%H559><s%>
<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to you, O Baruch: <S%H1263><s%>

'You <S%H559>said,<s%> "Ah, <S%H188>woe<s%> is me! For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H3254>added<s%> <S%H3015>sorrow<s%> to my <S%H4341>pain;<s%> I am <S%H3021>weary<s%> with my <S%H603>groaning<s%> and have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4496>rest.<s%>"'

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> you are to <S%H559>say<s%> to him, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> I have <S%H1129>built<s%> I am about to <S%H2040>tear<s%> <S%H2040>down,<s%> and <S%H834>what<s%> I have <S%H5193>planted<s%> I am about to <S%H5428>uproot,<s%> that is, the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%> "

'But you, are you <S%H1245>seeking<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1419>things<s%> for yourself? Do not <S%H1245>seek<s%> [them;] for <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H9567>disaster<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%>' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> 'but I will <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H5315>life<s%> to you as <S%H7998>booty<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4725>places<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you may <S%H1980>go.<s%>' "
